header_text: You are hosting a baby shower for a family member today and both the parents of the mom-to-be are attending. They're divorced and sometimes cause an embarrassing scene in public. During the shower, you think about her parents.

elements.text: You take a deep breath and re-focus on hosting the shower. You decide that you can't control her parents'...
